description: Try our easy to follow Marinated King Prawns Wrapped In Snowpeas recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Marinated King Prawns Wrapped In Snowpeas Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Marinate 20 peeled king prawns in 1 tsp grated lemon zest, a pinch of salt and pepper, 1 tsp olive oil, 1 tsp lemon juice, and a pinch of cayenne pepper. Blanch 20 large mangetout in boiling salted water for 1 minute, drain, refresh in cold water, and pat dry. Thread 1 end of the snowpeas onto a skewer, then a prawn followed by the other end of the snowpeas. Serve with aïoli or another flavoured mayonnaise.
